outcome: Citizens glimpse new freedoms as the BCI falters without Halden.

events.description: Public transportation systems randomly open to citizens with low scores, sparking curiosity and excitement.
A digital leak reveals parts of the BCI code, leading to debates about its transparency and ethics.
Marketplaces and businesses unintentionally allow access to services for people previously restricted by low BCI scores.
Small community groups form to explore and exploit gaps in the BCI, rediscovering a sense of freedom and agency.
